excerpt.rendered:
The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Monday 

Cream Parsnip & Celery Soup – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (celery, parsnip, carrot, white onion, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Green Peas with Tomato Sauce – vegan / gluten free / paper bio container / 300 g (green peas, tomato, dill, white onion, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or  gluten free option

Carrot Crackers Bread – raw / gluten free / 40 g (carrot, white sesame, tomato, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Carrot and Pumpkin Cake – raw / gluten free / 110 g (carrot, pumpkin, almond, cashew, cowberry, cinnamon, coconut, cocoa butter, orange, lemon, ginger, curcuma, vanilla, unfiltered honey)
